data.title: Intelligent Venues Feature 5G for Ultimate Stadium Experiences
data.meta_description: Enhance stadium experience with 5G smart venue connectivity and crowd analytics to make smarter decisions. Smart stadium solutions bring innovation to the 5G stadium experience.
data.text:
Using the cloud for processing and production helps decrease the need for an extensive crew of onsite production managers.

Verizon 5G is helping bring guests of venues and arenas together in safer, smarter and more immersive ways.

When the power of the cloud is built right into the network, it opens up a whole new world of near real-time retail innovation possibilities, including immersive experiences, media-rich marketing, digital engagement and more.

Provide connectivity, data and application visibility beyond your store walls with a fast, fixed internet connection that’s easy to self-install at any location where Verizon 4G LTE coverage is available.

Deploy network monitoring and cloud security services to address core network security, and leverage mobile solutions to help ensure data security across all your devices.

Get unprecedented insight into the root cause of disruptions across your network—even down to individual devices and applications—and help to provide optimal network performance for a superb online shopping experience.

Redefine what's possible in retail by using the low latency and massive capacity of 5G to drive immersive and personalized online, mobile and in-store experiences.

Transform your business with leading-edge connected devices, and use the Verizon ThingSpace platform to activate, monitor and manage their status.

Use mobile device management, mobile threat defense and endpoint security to help protect your customer and business data on devices across the retail ecosystem.

Capture your audience's attention with technologies designed to help you create and deliver powerful experiences that boost brand affinity.
